File include/defs.h

specs and db config information respectively. Also defines all the strings recognised when parsing input files.

Public Type Index

Config
@brief This structure holds parameters read from the idc par file.
CountOrDelete
@brief holds the test case data for an ODBCCountTables or an ODBCDeleteTables query.
CSSTablesDesc
@brief holds the test case data for a query listing supproted CssTable descriptions.
GeneralQuery
@brief holds the test case data for an ODBCGeneralQuery.
InsertRows
@brief holds the test case data for an ODBCInsertTables query.
SchemaQuery
@brief holds the test case data for an ODBCGetSchema query.
TableQuery
@brief holds the test case data for an ODBCQueryTable query.
UpdateRows
@brief holds the test case data for an ODBCUpdateTables query.
UpdateWhere
@brief holds the test case data for an ODBCUpdateTablesWhere query.

Public Types

Config 
    typedef struct configInfo {
       char	*dataSource;
       char *user;
       char *passwd; 
       char *lastIdTbl; 
       int  autoCommit;
    } Config;
@brief This structure holds parameters read from the idc par file.
CountOrDelete 
    typedef struct {
       char *tblName;
       char *tblType;
       int  whereNameNum;
       int  *whereIds;
       int  whereValNum;
       CssTable *whereVals;	
    } CountOrDelete;
@brief holds the test case data for an ODBCCountTables or an ODBCDeleteTables query
CSSTablesDesc 
    typedef struct {
       char *tblType;
    } CSSTablesDesc;
@brief holds the test case data for a query listing supproted CssTable descriptions
GeneralQuery 
    typedef struct {
       char *sql;
       int  maxRows;
    } GeneralQuery;
@brief holds the test case data for an ODBCGeneralQuery
InsertRows 
    typedef struct {
       char *tblName;
       char *tblType;
       char *tblsData;
       char *keyName;	
    } InsertRows;
@brief holds the test case data for an ODBCInsertTables query
SchemaQuery 
    typedef struct {
       char *schemaName;
    } SchemaQuery;
@brief holds the test case data for an ODBCGetSchema query
TableQuery 
    typedef struct {
       char *tblType;
       char *sql;
       int maxRows;
       int chunkSize;
       char *outFile;
    } TableQuery;
@brief holds the test case data for an ODBCQueryTable query
UpdateRows 
    typedef struct {
       char *tblName;
       char *tblType;
       char *oldRowsFile;
       char *newRowsFile;
    } UpdateRows;
@brief holds the test case data for an ODBCUpdateTables query
UpdateWhere 
    typedef struct {
       char *tblName;
       char *tblType;
       int  whereNameNum;   /* number of members of the whereIds array */ 
       int  *whereIds;      /* ids of the fields to be used in the where clause */
       int  updatesNum;	/* number of members of the whereVals and updateVals array */
       int  updateNameNum;  /* number of members of the UpdateIds array */
       int  *updateIds;     /* ids of fields to be updated */  
       CssTable *whereVals; /* values to be used in where clause */
       CssTable *updateVals;/* values to be used for updating */ 	
    } UpdateWhere;
@brief holds the test case data for an ODBCUpdateTablesWhere query
